languages.text: "Даже пес иногда может подхватить волчий вой. Твои слова достигли моего сердца, законодержец".

traits.locale_text: "Даже пес иногда может подхватить волчий вой. Твои слова достигли моего сердца, законодержец".

languages.text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
languages.original_text: "Даже пес иногда может подхватить волчий вой. Твои слова достигли моего сердца, законодержец".

traits.locale_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
"Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
"Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
"Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
"Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."
"Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

languages.text: 「犬ですら、ときには狼の遠吠えを真似ることがある。その言葉、しかと胸に響いたぞ、法の番人よ」
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: 「犬ですら、ときには狼の遠吠えを真似ることがある。その言葉、しかと胸に響いたぞ、法の番人よ」

languages.text: "Selbst ein Hund kann manchmal das Heulen des Wolfs aufnehmen. Eure Worte haben mein Herz erreicht, Gesetzeshüter."
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst ein Hund kann manchmal das Heulen des Wolfs aufnehmen. Eure Worte haben mein Herz erreicht, Gesetzeshüter."

languages.text: « Un chien est parfois capable de hurler comme un loup. Vos paroles me vont droit au cœur, gardien de la loi. »
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: « Un chien est parfois capable de hurler comme un loup. Vos paroles me vont droit au cœur, gardien de la loi. »

languages.text: «Hasta un perro sabe imitar en ocasiones el aullido de un lobo. Sus palabras me han llegado al alma, legislador».
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta un perro sabe imitar en ocasiones el aullido de un lobo. Sus palabras me han llegado al alma, legislador».

languages.text: “即便是狗，偶尔也会像狼一样嚎叫。你的话触动了我的心，执法者。”
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: “即便是狗，偶尔也会像狼一样嚎叫。你的话触动了我的心，执法者。”

languages.text: "Bazen de köpeğin kurdu böyle taklit edeceği tutar. Sözlerin gönül telimi titretti kanun koruyucu."
languages.original_text: "Even a dog may at times echo the wolf's howl. Your words have reached my heart, lawkeeper."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen de köpeğin kurdu böyle taklit edeceği tutar. Sözlerin gönül telimi titretti kanun koruyucu."
